display_long_description:
Welcome to Drone Sim XR, a drone simulator with full mixed reality support for Meta Quest 3 devices!

Drone Sim XR is an exciting drone simulator in mixed reality, combining the comfort of your room with the spirit of adventure in picturesque locations.

Control a drone and enjoy the flight from both third-person and immersive first-person views — seeing yourself and your surroundings from the drone’s onboard camera.

At this stage, you can support the development by purchasing the game in Early Access at the most favorable price and contributing to its further progress.

Fly out the window or door and explore five beautiful, atmospheric environments: 🏝️ Island • 🌲 Forest • 🌸 Japan • 🏜️ Egypt • ❄️ Winter

Thanks to Meta Quest 3 passthrough technology, you can see the drone flying right in your real room — just like in real life. Watch the flight on a virtual screen or put on virtual FPV goggles for full immersion.

- Full mixed reality integration with passthrough support
- 5 scenic environments beyond your room
- 2 realistic drone control modes
- Virtual FPV display and goggles
- Support for controllers, gamepad (for now only PS), and hand tracking
- Ideal for VR drone racing fans

By purchasing the game now, you gain access to the current version as well as all future updates, including new features, gameplay improvements, and expanded content!
